sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: File.Copy renames a file or directory named by the srcPathName parameter to the destName parameter. The destName parameter must be a name only. In other words File.Rename can't move a file between different directories.
sections.mdown_content: **File.Copy** renames a file or directory named by the *srcPathName* parameter to the *destName* parameter. The *destName* parameter must be a name only. In other words **File.Rename** can't move a file between different directories.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content: If the File.Rename call fails, then Error.Last will return a non-zero value indicating the reason for the failure. Error.LastMsg will return a string which contains the textual version of the error.
sections.mdown_content: If the **File.Rename **call fails, then **Error.Last** will return a non-zero value indicating the reason for the failure. **Error.LastMsg** will return a string which contains the textual version of the error.

sections.title: Example
code:
File.Rename ("/usr/west/example", "testcase")
        if Error.Last = eNoError then
            put "File renamed"
        else
            put "Did not rename the file."
            put "Error: ", Error.LastMsg
        end if
sections.raw_content: This program renames the file "/usr/west/example" to "testcase"
sections.mdown_content: This program renames the file "*/usr/west/example*" to "*testcase*"

sections.title: Execute
sections.raw_content: An example program is available that creates a file in the current directory, renames it to a different name using File.Rename, checks the existence of both files using File.Exists and then deletes the file using File.Delete.
sections.mdown_content:
An example program is available that creates a file in the current 
directory, renames it to a different name using **File.Rename**, 
checks the existence of both files using **File.Exists** and then 
deletes the file using **File.Delete**.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling File.Rename, not by calling Rename.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **File.Rename**, not by calling **Rename**.
